comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: This doesn't look like a new church to me. It appears to be an aerial view of State House, Lusaka (then called Government House).

comment.author: 59350149@N07
comment._content: I agree with AJ Scott. This is Government House on the Ridgeway Lusaka later State House on Independence Ave

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: This is undoubtedly Government House Lusaka, residence of the Governor and later, as State House, of the President of Zambia
